question: The Akan Mashu National Park (AMNP) is located in which country?
explanation: The Akan Mashu National Park (AMNP) is located on the island of Hokkaid≈ç, Japan and covers an area of 90,481 hectares. The park is famous for its crystal clear lakes, its hot springs and its large marimo. It is the only place where marimo of appreciable size form naturally in Japan.
